message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  I'm asking $11,000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'd be willing to make a serious offer at that price.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I want to make this work for both of us.  How about we split the difference and settle on $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $9,500. Can we make that work?
